title: Auto Train
heading: Amtrak's Auto Train
top_text:
The Auto Train carries passengers only with a motor vehicle.

Auto Train check-in for vehicles starts at 12:30 PM and closes at 3:00 PM in both directions.
For details and up-to-date requirements, see
https://www.amtrak.com/route-content/auto-train-boarding-and-vehicle-requirements.html.
